title: Understanding Cloud Computing Basics
author: Sandra Chinonso
excerpt: A beginner-friendly guide to the fundamental concepts of cloud computing and its benefits.
content:
Cloud computing is revolutionizing how businesses and individuals store data and run applications. In this post, we explore the core ideas...

- SaaS, PaaS, IaaS
- Public, Private, Hybrid Clouds
- Key benefits: Scalability, Cost-efficiency, Reliability
